dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A northwestern cyclone sweeping into Kazakhstan, bringing a sudden drop in temperatures and even snow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A northwestern cyclone sweeping into Kazakhstan, bringing a sudden drop in temperatures and even snow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As noted by meteorologists, just as residents of the northern regions began to feel the arrival of spring, enjoying sunshine and warmth, a northwestern cyclone swept into Kazakhstan, bringing a noticeable drop in temperatures and a shift from rain to snow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, just as people in the north were starting to enjoy some spring sunshine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, just as people in the north were starting to enjoy some spring sunshine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As noted by meteorologists, just as residents of the northern regions began to feel the arrival of spring, enjoying sunshine and warmth, a northwestern cyclone swept into Kazakhstan, bringing a noticeable drop in temperatures and a shift from rain to snow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it says even the southern regions felt a bit of that chill. Not what you'd expect for mid-April.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it says even the southern regions felt a bit of that chill. Not what you'd expect for mid-April.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even residents of the southern regions felt traces of the cold.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it looks like the surprises aren't over—rain turning into snow again on the 19th in the north and east.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And it looks like the surprises aren't over-rain turning into snow again on the nineteenth in the north and east.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the spring surprises are not over yet: in the coming days, rain will persist in the northern and eastern regions, which on April 19 may again turn into snow, the statement says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, but at least there's a gradual temperature rise expected overall. That's something positive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, but at least there's a gradual temperature rise expected overall. That's something positive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Despite the rain, a gradual rise in air temperature is expected across Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, though the west is getting the real spring treatment—sunny and up to 30 degrees Celsius!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, though the west is getting the real spring treatment-sunny and up to thirty degrees Celsius!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Only the western part of the country is forecasted to experience truly spring-like weather " it will be sunny, with daytime temperatures reaching 25"30 degrees Celsius.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Thirty degrees? That's a huge difference from snow. Must be confusing dressing for the weather there right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirty degrees? That's a huge difference from snow. Must be confusing dressing for the weather there right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. You could have people in coats up north and folks in t-shirts out west on the same day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. You could have people in coats up north and folks in t-shirts out west on the same day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder how farmers or, like, outdoor workers are handling these swings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder how farmers or, like, outdoor workers are handling these swings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's gotta be tough. Sudden frost after a warm spell can really affect crops.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's gotta be tough. Sudden frost after a warm spell can really affect crops.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. At least the forecast gives a heads-up, so maybe they can prepare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. At least the forecast gives a heads-up, so maybe they can prepare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And hey, if you're in the west, sounds like a perfect time for a picnic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And hey, if you're in the west, sounds like a perfect time for a picnic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hah, true! Just avoid the northern regions unless you've got your winter gear handy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hah, true! Just avoid the northern regions unless you've got your winter gear handy.
